author: Kashmira Gander
title: Is a Sore Throat a Symptom of Coronavirus? How to Tell the Difference Between Hay Fever and COVID-19
description: Experts told Newsweek how a person should decide whether to self-isolate when they aren't sure if they have COVID-19 or the allergy.
content: For millions of people, spring ushers in the irritating and sometimes debilitating symptoms of hay fever, from a stuffy nose to a scratchy throat. And this year, many sufferers will be trying to manage their condition while monitoring themselves for COVID-19 … [+6412 chars]
